name: Badgers Revenge!!!
description:
If youve ever wanted revenge on somone, then you know how this badger feels.

Step inside the fur of the Chief Badger and get your bloodshed on by killing the evil Kamikaze Kat that destroyed your home and is wrecking the forests.

Play through three levels each with their own boss to destroy and save the forest.

Use A,S,D to move and duck

Move mouse to aim

Left click to shoot

Shoot the enemy, not yourself. :)
